{"id":1521579379,"question_id":3751,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 week, 4 days","timestamp":1737936308,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"6 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1521579379/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Maximum Frequency After Subarray Operation","memory":"96.7 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int maxFrequency(vector<int>& nums, int k) {//1 <= nums[i] <= 50\n        int n = nums.size();\n        vector<int> freq(51, 0);\n        int freq_k = 0;\n        int res = 0;\n        for(int i=0; i<n; i++) {\n            freq[ nums[i] ] = max(freq[ nums[i] ], freq_k )+1;\n            res += (nums[i]==k);\n            freq_k += (nums[i]==k);\n            res = max(res, freq[ nums[i] ]);\n        }\n        return res;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"maximum-frequency-after-subarray-operation","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
